description:
RealSimpleEDU.com brings you on-the-go learning and reference for First Aid

App offers quizzes and tutorials  to help you learn First Aid

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App Tools include search .



Includes following tutorials:

First Aid Introduction,
Basic Measures for First Aid,
Basic First Aid Tips,
First Aid for Wounds,
Bone Joint and Muscle Injuries,
Bites and Stings,
Allergic Reactions,
Bleeding,
Breathing Problems,
Burns,
Choking,
Cold Exposure,
Heat Exposure,
Poisoning,
Medical Emergencies,
Emergency First Aid Techniques,
Legal Considerations in First Aid,
First Aid Kit.


Includes following quizzes:

Quiz on Injuries,
Quiz on Burns,
Quiz on Choking and Cold Exposure,
Quiz on First Aid Kit.


Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and most complete.

Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
